block.name: Message Source
block.doc: Creates a data source from a message. Message passing is the mechanism that allows data to flow between the Python and C++ layers of GNU Radio.

param.name: Output Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type that will be created from the input message.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
